title: Identify Reno arch typeface
content:
Hello,  
I'm a graphic designer in Reno and have been searching for the font used in the iconic Reno arch (link to picture here [http://www.zazzle.com/reno\_sign\_white\_photo-190514313624163826](http://web.archive.org/web/20140625134034/http:/www.zazzle.com/reno_sign_white_photo-190514313624163826 "http://www.zazzle.com/reno\_sign\_white\_photo-190514313624163826")). For the life of me, I can't find a font that matches.

Anyone know this typeface?
author: JosieLuci

comments.content:
Let's comment in the Font ID section:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/117476](http://web.archive.org/web/20140625134034/http:/www.typophile.com/node/117476 "http://www.typophile.com/node/117476")
